content:encoded:
Nintendo has always ruled the handheld gaming console industry for a long time. However, Asus might be planning to challenge the title battle with its ROG Ally handheld console release. The new Asus ROG Ally’s future is looking very promising; furthermore, it may even overshadow its competitors Nintendo Switch and Steam Deck.

The Asus ROG Ally has already shocked the handheld console industry to its core with its unbelievable specs. Indeed, Asus has drawn several players’ attention and could be a serious competitor for Nintendo in the future. Interestingly, Steam Deck has also congratulated Asus for ROG Ally’s release and promised to look forward to its revolutionary performance.

The Steam Deck praises the new threat to the handheld console industry for the Asus ROG Ally release

The much anticipated handheld gaming device from Asus, the Asus ROG Ally, has officially been revealed. ROG Ally brings a 7-inch IPS LCD display with FHD resolution, a 16:9 aspect ratio, and a 120Hz refresh rate. It will be running on Windows 11, the ROG Ally will also offer three months of free Xbox Game Pass Ultimate.

Not to mention, it will also be compatible with third-party game clients such as Steam and Epic Games. While the Asus ROG Ally will be competing against Nintendo Switch and the Steam Deck, its full-fledged Windows 11 PC scaled down to the handheld form factor. The AMD Zen4 device comes as a direct challenger to Valve‚Äôs Steam Deck, offering an impressive package for gaming.

While fans are still comprehending the Asus ROG Ally’s crazy specs, Nintendo and the Steam Deck’s future might be in deep trouble. Regardless, the Steam Deck has shared a positive response to Asus ROG Ally’s launch announcement. Moreover, we saw a healthy relationship sign between the two competitors.

Thank you!! We're big fans of Valve, and love that the openness of the PC platform allows gamers to bring their Steam libraries to devices like the Ally.
Here's to the next chapter of handheld gaming!

— ROG Global (@ASUS_ROG) May 12, 2023

Interestingly, we saw a very wholesome interaction between the two handheld console industry competitors on Twitter. Furthermore, Steam Deck is not the only handheld console that may face severe consequences with the ROG Ally launch. Despite being released for six long years, the Nintendo President shoots down all the rumors about the next-gen Switch console in development.

content:encoded:
The New York Knicks met with heartbreak as they failed to force a Game 7. Jimmy Butler and the Miami Heat continued their epic run from being a play-in team to being the first Eastern Conference finalists. The battle was close with New York having hope, the tiniest of vision of pushing this series further. However, Miami was able to hold them off. After coming so close, there is no doubt, the Knicks will be upset. But for one of their stars, it is still one of the best and most important days of his life.

The Knicks lost 92-96 in the season-ending Game 6 to the Miami Heat. Jimmy Butler and Co. will face the winner of the Boston Celtics-Philadelphia 76ers series who play a Game 7 tomorrow.

Knicks Star checked into Game 6 with a unique superpower?

For any Knicks player, there was one goal in mind, to beat the Heat. Nothing could waver them from that objective. Yet there was one guy who had his emotions go haywire before Game 6. Josh Hart, the former Lakers forward got a call hours before the game that he was going to be a first-time father. Without taking a second, he rushed into the car to get to his wife, Shannon Phillips.

Unfortunately, the doctors gave him some shattering news. They weren’t sure if he could make it to see the birth of his twins. Hart had to make a call, and so he made a brave one. The 28-year-old went back to the team hotel in Miami and instantly got on a Zoom call to watch the pregnancy.

READ MORE-Knicks Veteran Dismantles Michael Jordan GOAT Debate With an Honest LeBron James Question

Hart would play in Game 6, but irrespective of the result, there was only one thing he wanted to do after the final buzzer.

“No matter the result of this game, he has a car, he has a plane on standby. When the final buzzer sounds, he is going to be rushing back to New York so he can meet his new family,” reported Malika Andrews.

From NBA Countdown: Josh Hart had a helicopter, plane and police escort on standby to travel from Miami, but his twin boys just couldn‚Äôt wait. Hart and his wife Shannon welcomed their sons on Friday ‚Äî he will have new dad powers for the Knicks in Game 6. pic.twitter.com/w4t8sKmzvI

— Malika Andrews (@malika_andrews) May 12, 2023

Hart didn’t let his heavenly high distract him from the Knicks’ attempt at forcing a Game 7. Coming off the bench, he scored 11 points and grabbed 7 rebounds, all while shooting 50% from the field. His Villanova teammate Jalen Brunson exploded for 41, but it still wasn’t enough for New York. They couldn’t get past the Miami Heat, who played scintillating defense in the series clincher.

WATCH THIS STORY: Bubba Wallace Makes a ‚ÄúPressure‚Äù Revelation Involving Notorious Michael Jordan Weeks After Asking to Be Replaced

While his playoff journey ends, Hart is about to embark on a new chapter of his life – being a father.

content:encoded:
Despite his clinical performance at the Kansas Speedway, stealing a much-needed victory, Denny Hamlin was treated with boos and yelling on the victory lane as disappointed Hendrick Motorsports fans vividly expressed their displeasure with the #11 driver as he stole the win from Kyle Larson in the last-minute.

While the community is divided over the driver’s tactics, Hamlin was all hyped up as he proudly joined his co-host Jared Allen on the studio floor with the Kansas trophy, dishing out yet another interesting episode of Action Detrimental.

The Joe Gibbs Racing driver came out with the latest episode of his popular podcast. The duo discussed Sunday’s race while Hamlin recalled a wholesome moment with his daughter after his first win of this year.

Puzzled Denny Hamlin recalls the conversation with his daughter after Kansas

After his much-needed win at the speedway, the veteran driver recalled a candid conversation with his daughter after the race that left him puzzled. Though the 23Xl Racing co-owner is the fiery driver inside the oval, he is also a loving father to his daughter.

Getting reminders of his daughter’s favorite character, Dorothy, a fictional character based on the popular cartoon, “Wizard of the Oz,” Hamlin recalled the sweet conversation with his daughter after he clinched the Kansas trophy.

Starting off the conversation, Hamlin quickly shared the wholesome moment, saying, “So my daughter on Facetime says, Daddy, you won in my home state. I‚Äôm like, ‘What are you talking about?’ She‚Äôs like, ‘I‚Äôm Dorothy.’ I‚Äôm like, Oh that‚Äôs right, so yeah shout-out to Dorothy, winning in her home state.”

As his co-host, Jared Allen said, “No place like home.” Hamlin also resonated with the emotion as said, “No place like home and for me 4 times there, shoot feels like home that‚Äôs for sure.”

Further on during the conversation, the 42-year-old veteran discussed the recent happenings in NASCAR including Legacy Motor Club’s massive heel turn. However, it was clear that despite being an aggressive and feisty competitor on the track, he is also a loving father. The driver has also been open about his family time.

Looking back at Denny Hamlin’s special day with his daughter at the father-daughter dance

Besides being a fierce competitor and being busy as a co-owner of 23Xl Racing, Hamlin is also a proud father of two girls. When off the tracks, the JGR driver certainly finds quality time for his family. Recently the driver revealed to the community his special father-daughter dance as he accompanied his daughter on her special day.

The NASCAR community witnessed the driver in the father role, celebrating with his daughter as they danced together. Hamlin also shared funny instances of his daughter, Molly, having fun with her friends while Hamlin was anxious and skeptical to shake a leg at the program.

This could be one of the reasons why the JGR driver is seeing a rise in popularity. Fans love the inside scoops he offers in his podcast as well as the other side of his persona.

content:encoded:
The notion of transparency in sports is of utmost importance. Especially in sports like NASCAR, where rules guide each and every aspect of the sport. It not only states the facts but also renders a sense of parity in the game. It was Denny Hamlin who had earlier advocated this idea. But again, it opens a floodgate of questions and controversies. And perhaps it will open the door to the dead past. Even Dale Earnhart Jr was critical of the fact.

However, NASCAR seems to abide by popular opinions. And few NASCAR insiders gladly accept the fact.

Freddie Kraft considers that the NASCAR rule is spot on

Freddie Kraft is one such person who gladly accepts the importance of transparency. In the latest episode of the Door Bumper Clear podcast, co-host Freddie Kraft clearly gave his nod in the “Spot On Spot Off” segment.

A question that a fan asked was, “NASCAR displayed the part in a question from the number 3 teams, post Martinsville in the hauler for teams to view. They also posted the pictures and explanations of the violations on the social team for fans to see. Spot On or Spot Off, Freddie?”

On his part, Bubba Wallace‚Äôs spotter replied, “Spot on, you know. I will because I don‚Äôt know what I am looking at when you explain it to me, probably. Brett commented I don‚Äôt even know what I am looking at. Like, what is that? But I am sure a lot of people, they do know what exactly that is and what exactly what it does.”

He further added, “And now they are planning on a way a little bit better, so they don‚Äôt get caught. So I think that‚Äôs the takeaway from when you see this type of stuff out. Oh, that‚Äôs how they are doing now. How can I tweak that right there to make it? So I don‚Äôt get caught like they did. So it will be interesting to see how it plays out. But I think 100% spot on for NASCAR to do that to explain it.”

Watch This Story: F***ing **** Measuring Contest: Bubba Wallace Calls out Christopher Wallace amid Las Vegas Altercation.

NASCAR’s rule comes as a blow to Dale Earnhardt Jr

Freddie Kraft welcomed the move from NASCAR with open arms. But comes as a shocker for many, perhaps even Dale Earnhardt Jr. Junior thinks this initiative to be a silly move. In a recent episode of The Dale Jr. Download podcast, he said, “If you wanted to see it, you could walk up in the hauler and it‚Äôd be in there, on the counter, You could go up there and say, ‚ÄòI heard you took such-and-such. Where is it? I‚Äôd like to see it. They might show it to you, it may be laying there, they might not show it to you.”

He also opined how this rule could have a negative impact on the teams. He exclaimed, “If I‚Äômma put my owner‚Äôs hat on and I‚Äôm going to the racetrack as an Xfinity Series owner, somebody got caught with something, NASCAR took it. I don‚Äôt need to see it. I don‚Äôt have this urge to take a look at it. I‚Äôm not as curious about what they did to those louvers as the general public or the race fan is.”

Well, now the question that hovers is how teams react to it. Will it turn out to be beneficial as Denny Hamlin had suggested and protect teams from facing more arbitrary penalties or is it just a silly move? Only time holds answers to these questions.

content:encoded:
Call of Duty Modern Warfare II is currently the ongoing entry in the long-running franchise. However, it will soon be overshadowed by another brand new installment. Interestingly, the next game is going to be its own continuation, but with a twist.

Recent leaks have revealed that the upcoming premium offering from Activision in 2023 will be called Modern Warfare III. As of now, it’s not confirmed but insiders have claimed that it will arrive with exciting content upon release. Most importantly, it’s rumored to come up with a massive battle royale map for Warzone 2!

Las Almas map to be revealed in Call of Duty Modern Warfare III Season 1 for Warzone 2

Tom Henderson is one of the most reputed scoopers online. He’s got a track record of being near-accurate on many occasions. Especially, when it comes to sharing crucial intel on any new COD game. In one of his newest leaks, shared through an article, the insider mentioned a lot of exciting details for this year’s entry. It’s expected to be helmed by Sledgehammer Games – the studio behind Vanguard.

Moreover, the leak also revealed a new Warzone 2 map. The latter will be unveiled during Call of Duty Modern Warfare III’s first season. Precisely speaking, this map is going to be Las Almas.

READ MORE: Will Activision Reveal Call of Duty Modern Warfare III in Summer Game Fest 2023?

For those who are not aware, Las Almas was an important part of Modern Warfare II’s Campaign. It was seen during the mission ‘Alone’ where Soap had to survive by escaping Shadow Company using stealth tactics. In general, this fictional city is located in the region of New Mexico. Mostly, it is a hilly area in northern side of the country, near the border of Texas in the United States.

Per the leaks, Las Almas will act as the next major battle royale area for Warzone 2. Interestingly, players have already got portions of this place in the form of Multiplayer maps. Modern Warfare II features Mercado Las Almas and Santa Sena Border Crossing for various 6v6 modes. However, witnessing this region in a full-fledged form will be amazing for Warzone 2 fans.

Activision is yet to officially reveal something on MWIII and its content in the coming months. What are your expectations for the next battle royale map in the franchise? Let us know in the comments below.

content:encoded:
Mike Tyson lived a hedonistic lifestyle after reaching the pinnacles of fame that followed his successful boxing career. He spent his fortune recklessly on 3 Bengal tigers priced at $60,000 each, bought some pretty e xpensive pigeons, and also wasted a good chunk of his money on luxurious cars. Well, he surely made a change later in his life as he grew older, but due to his image of being a spendthrift, Tyson’s most admirable quality got overshadowed.

Not a lot of people know that ‘The Baddest Man on the Planet’ is a charitable man. His altruistic nature has actually made a difference in the world multiple times and has helped thousands of people. One such instance is when he fought against Roy Jones Jr back in 2020, he donated most of his earnings of $10 million dollars to charity. Moreover, he also has his own charitable organization, Mike Tyson Cares Foundation, which focuses on helping families that fall in the lower income category. It’s a way to give them a better life and make their situation more comfortable and sustainable.

Recently, another good deed of Mike Tyson has come forth in front of the public as Criss Angel joined as a guest on Hotboxin’ with Mike Tyson where he shared how Tyson has donated money to his Foundation multiple times for the cause of fighting against pediatric cancer.

Criss Angel is grateful for Mike Tyson’s help

At the very beginning of the episode, after the guest’s introduction was done, Angel started praising Tyson as a person and a boxer. He also shed some light on their relationship, on how Tyson would bring his kids to Angel’s shows all the time. He was honored to be friends with such a great personality and a “wonderful human being”. Criss also stated how a lot of people don’t really understand the soft side of Tyson.

Then he revealed how Tyson has donated lump sums of money to patients with pediatric cancer. Angel said, “You have donated so much money to pediatric cancer, to my Foundation and I just want to say as a friend and as a person with the kid that went through it, thank you so much.”

Angel also got a bit choked up with emotions as the past few years have been a bit hard on him as a father. But now everything is much better because his son is currently in remission for more than a year now.

Watch This Story: Youngest Boxing Champions in History: Mike Tyson, Wilfred Benitez, and More

Criss Angel gives good news to the world

In 2015, Criss Angel went through a difficult challenge when his son was diagnosed with B-Cell A.L.L. Leukemia. He had to undergo chemotherapy treatments to get rid of the cancer. Being deeply affected by this experience, Criss Angel founded a charitable organization named Jonny Christopher Children’s Charitable Foundation. It is now 2022 and he has announced that his son is in remission. There has been no indication of cancer returning, which is great news for their family.

As a proud dad, Angel recently posted a 14-minute documentary on his Official YouTube channel titled “1095,” which showcased his son’s struggles. However, things have improved for Jonny, and he has demonstrated his resilience quite well throughout all these years. Angel expressed his gratitude towards Tyson who has played a significant role in helping other children who have faced similar challenges.

Tyson’s philanthropic efforts have been remarkable. What is your opinion on his charitable endeavors? Feel free to share your views with us in the comment section below.

content:encoded:
Mike Tyson is undoubtedly one of the most popular professional boxers there has ever been in the sport. The former heavyweight is considered to be one of the best boxers ever to tighten their gloves. And it can be conspicuously seen in his old fights. But, apart from knocking his opponents out cold, the former champion developed other interests very early on. Tyson has had a long-time affinity towards pigeons since childhood. So much so that he once beat up a man for killing one of his pigeons when he was just a child.

However, in a recent episode of his podcast, the champ opened up about the other side of loving pigeons and how sometimes he just had to let them go.

Mike Tyson on his pigeons getting lost

In a recent episode of Hotboxin’ with Mike Tyson, the 56-year-old was joined by Magician and entertainer Criss Angel. The two shared their love for pigeons and even talked about how they train their pigeons to perform certain tasks. Angel was in awe of Tyson’s work with pigeons and how he makes them do various activities.

Read More: Mike Tyson Inadvertently Reveals Why You Shouldn‚Äôt Buy Pigeons From Him

Angel said, “What he does with his pigeons is so remarkable. Because they have these pigeons and they race them. And, they can have these pigeons go to a specific part.” He further shared his own example claiming that he could only make the pigeons go to a specific part within the same building. And when Tyson was asked about how far the pigeons can travel. He gave a startling response and said, “a thousand miles.”

Tyson also revealed that he starts training the pigeon as soon as they hatch from their eggs. But then Angel had an interesting question and asked how many pigeons did Tyson “lose along the way” when he “let them go” . To which Tyson replied, “It’s not a big percentage. It depends on the ferocity of the predator. Sometimes they get lost.”

How much does Mike Tyson love his pigeons?

‘Iron Mike’ has an undying love for pigeons. And, as we know, Tyson does not care about money when it comes to things he loves. According to certain reports, he once spent over $400,000 on his pigeons.

The pigeons bring out a rather different side of Mike Tyson than what the fans are used to. What do you think about Mike Tyson’s love for pigeons? Let us know in the comments.

content:encoded:
Since 2017, Fortnite has remained the best gaming title to come up with fascinating events. Its makers have got an amazing approach of collaborating with renowned entities. As a result, many fan favorite characters, from pop culture and real life, have made their way into the battle royale over the last few years, including streamers. Names like SypherPK, Loserfruit, LazarBeam, and Ninja have got their own playable avatars in Epic Games’ free-to-play blockbuster. But now, the makers of Call of Duty have also decided to use this formula in their ongoing entry Modern Warfare II.

In case anyone missed keeping track of events, Activision had recently unveiled surprising bundles featuring two fan-favorite streamers. Both of them will soon arrive in Modern Warfare II and Warzone 2, with their own playable Operators. Well these two personalities are none other than TimTheTatman and Nickmercs.

Will Call of Duty continue bringing more bundles themed on gaming streamers similar to Fortnite?

TimTheTatman had recently announced his collaboration with Modern Warfare II. His fans will be able to acquire a playable Operator, directly based on their favorite content creator, later this month. Same is the case with Nickmercs as well who will receive a dedicated bundle with an amazing Spartan skin inspired by the streamer.

thank you for all the love yesterday

still can‚Äôt believe I have my own operator in @callofduty pic.twitter.com/lJoRIqblLj

— timthetatman (@timthetatman) May 11, 2023

We‚Äôre officially in @CallofDuty

Peep my new MFAM Operator & skin bundle ‚Äî available 5.31.23! pic.twitter.com/h4TMWdNxG8

— FaZe Nickmercs (@NICKMERCS) May 10, 2023

For any Call of Duty lover, it’s the first time witnessing such a crossover involving streamers themselves. So far, the action franchise has introduced multiple events but this is something unique.

READ MORE: ‚ÄúThis Update Is a Game-Changer‚Äù ‚Äì Call of Duty Modern Warfare II Fans Are Amazed by This Quality of Life Change in Season 3 Reloaded

Maybe it’s the beginning of an expanded streak featuring even more such collaborations, just like Fortnite. Or maybe the people at Activision are trying this new approach to keep the players hooked to their games in future as well. Streamers are quite popular these days and many gaming enthusiasts are fond of watching them. Hence, rolling out events including characters based on the top content creators might end up being a profitable idea eventually.

Only time will tell whether this move is a masterstroke or not. The latest Call of Duty installment in Modern Warfare II is now available across the globe. What are your thoughts on the title having streamers as playable Operators? Let us know in the comments down below.

content:encoded:
The Undertaker dominated the squared circle for a long time. During all these years, there haven’t been many complaints about the wrestling star. However, an old opponent of The Phenom has recently raised his voice against him. Koko B. Ware recently tweeted while sharing a picture of him with The Undertaker during in-ring action.

The Hall of Famer wrote a hilarious caption over the picture. In the caption, he claimed that he was comparatively taller until the day Taker performed his finisher on him. The story, the picture, and the caption all add up to be a hilarious internet moment.

The Undertaker cost ‘Birdman’ his height

One of the most highlighted qualities of Koko B. Ware was the theme song that he sang for himself. While several wrestlers have a custom song, not all of them have sung it for themselves like ‘Birdman’. Apart from this, another key event in his career was enduring The Undertaker’s Tombstone Piledriver for the first time. Koko recently used this highlight recently to target Taker in a hilarious fashion.

I was 6‚Äô 3‚Äù before this Tombstone. Thanks @undertaker. pic.twitter.com/gICFpZ1yLC

— Koko B. Ware (@wwekokobware) May 11, 2023

He uploaded a picture of The Undertaker giving him the finisher move and wrote, “ I was 6‚Äô 3‚Äù before this Tombstone. Thanks [Undertaker].” While B. Ware’s actual height is 5′ 7″, the former wrestler claims he was originally 6’3″, only six inches shorter than Taker, before he compressed his spine.

To see the former wrestler making light-hearted quips on social media must be a relief for his fans.

This is because B. Ware was rushed to the hospital due to a medical emergency a few months ago.

Koko B. Ware’s medical emergency

In December 2022, B. Ware was rushed to the hospital. Although there were not many updates about B. Ware’s health in between, it appears that the former wrestler eventually got better.

There was an endless line of prayers and wishes for the Hall of Famer to feel better soon. All those prayers, along with the commendable efforts of the medical professionals, appear to have changed the situation for the better.

Now that the wrestler is having fun on social media, fans could be feeling a little more at ease regarding his health concern.
